author: CBS News
title: Pastor holds services despite virus ban, citing 1st Amendment
description: A California church now has a public nuisance notice posted on its front doors for failing to comply with the state's public health stay-at-home order.
content: sA California church now has a public nuisance notice posted on its front doors for failing to comply with the state's public health stay-at-home order. CBS Sacramento reports that Pastor Jon Duncan of Cross Culture Christian Center in Lodi has continued to h… [+2072 chars]
